00061 class Coord : public cObject
00062 {
00063 public:
00064   static const double UNDEFINED;
00065 
00066 protected:
00068     double x, y, z;
00069 
00070     bool use2DFlag;

00072 public:
00073 
00078     Coord(bool use2D = false)
00079         :x(0.0), y(0.0), use2DFlag(use2D)
00080     {
00081 
00082         if (use2D) {
00083             z = UNDEFINED;
00084         } else {
00085             z = 0.0;
00086         }
00087     }
00088 
00090     Coord(double x, double y, double z)
00091         : x(x), y(y), z(z) , use2DFlag(false) {}
00092 
00094     Coord(double x, double y)
00095         : x(x), y(y), z(UNDEFINED) , use2DFlag(true) {}
00096 
00097 
00099     Coord( const Coord& pos )
00100         : cObject(pos), x(pos.x), y(pos.y), z(pos.z), use2DFlag(pos.use2DFlag) {}
00101 
00103     Coord( const Coord* pos )
00104         : cObject(*pos), x(pos->x), y(pos->y), z(pos->z), use2DFlag(pos->use2DFlag) {}
00105 
00107     std::string info() const {
00108         std::stringstream os;
00109         if (use2DFlag) {
00110             os << "(" << x << "," << y << ")";
00111         } else {
00112             os << "(" << x << "," << y << "," << z << ")";
00113         }
00114         return os.str();
00115     }

00122         Coord tmp = a;
00123         tmp += b;
00124         return tmp;
00125     }

00187         x = a.x;

00189         z = a.z;
00190         use2DFlag = a.use2DFlag;

00212     friend bool operator==(const Coord& a, const Coord& b) {
00213         return FWMath::close(a.x, b.x) && FWMath::close(a.y, b.y) && FWMath::close(a.z, b.z);
00214     }
00215 
00222     friend bool operator!=(const Coord& a, const Coord& b) {
00223         return !(a==b);
00224     }

00230     double distance( const Coord& a ) const {
00231         Coord dist=*this-a;
00232         return dist.length();
00233     }

00240         Coord dist=*this-a;
00241         return dist.squareLength();

00249     double sqrTorusDist(const Coord& b, const Coord& playgroundSize) const;

00254     double squareLength() const
00255     {
00256         return x * x + y * y + z * z;
00257     }
00258 
00262     double length() const
00263     {
00264         return sqrt(squareLength());
00265     }

00280     double getY() const{ return y; }

00285     void setY(double y){this->y = y;}

00295     double getZ() const{ return z; }

00315     bool isValid() const {
00316         return (z == UNDEFINED) || !use2DFlag;
00317     }
00318 
00322     bool is2D() const { return use2DFlag; }
00323 
00327     bool is3D() const { return !use2DFlag; }
00328 
00337     bool isInRectangle(const Coord& upperLeftCorner, const Coord& lowerRightCorner) const {
00338         return  x >= upperLeftCorner.x && x <= lowerRightCorner.x &&
00339                 y >= upperLeftCorner.y && y <= lowerRightCorner.y &&
00340                 (use2DFlag || (z >= upperLeftCorner.z && z <= lowerRightCorner.z));
00341     }
00342 
00346     Coord min(const Coord& a) {
00347         Coord tmp = *this;
00348   tmp.setX(this->x < a.x ? this->x : a.x);
00349   tmp.setY(this->y < a.y ? this->y : a.y);
00350   if (tmp.is3D())
00351     tmp.setZ(this->z < a.z ? this->z : a.z);
00352         return tmp;
00353     }
00354 
00358     Coord max(const Coord& a) {
00359         Coord tmp = *this;
00360   tmp.setX(this->x > a.x ? this->x : a.x);
00361   tmp.setY(this->y > a.y ? this->y : a.y);
00362   if (tmp.is3D())
00363     tmp.setZ(this->z > a.z ? this->z : a.z);
00364         return tmp;
00365     }
00366 
00371     friend bool operator>(const Coord& a, const Coord& b) {
00372   return (a.x > b.x &&
00373     a.y > b.y &&
00374     (a.is3D() ? a.z > b.z : true));
00375     }
00376 
00381     friend bool operator<(const Coord& a, const Coord& b) {
00382   return (a.x < b.x &&
00383     a.y < b.y &&
00384     (a.is3D() ? a.z < b.z : true));
00385     }
